Capital. Strategy. Execution.
Ampera Green LLC

We help founders and innovators structure, position, and raise capital for high impact companies in technology, bioscience, and green energy.

View Services

Services

Tailored support across capital raising, strategy, and investor communications.

Capital Raise Advisory

Structure and position your raise, refine the financial story, and prepare investor ready materials for seed, growth, or strategic capital.

Investor & Partner Outreach

Identify aligned investors, family offices, and strategic partners and support outreach, follow up, and data room readiness.

Strategy & Positioning

Clarify your value proposition, market thesis, and go to market plan so that investors understand the opportunity and the path to scale.

Sectors We Focus On

We work with founders at the intersection of technology, health, and sustainability.

Bioscience & Healthtech
Diagnostic platforms, digital health, and translational science ventures preparing for clinical and commercial scale.
Green Energy & Climate
Clean energy, storage, and sustainability projects that require thoughtful capital structures and long term partners.
Technology & Data
Software, AI, and data driven platforms that need clear storytelling around product, traction, and defensibility.

Our Approach

Structured, practical, and focused on outcomes for both founders and investors.

  • Step 1

    Discovery & Readiness Check

    We start with a focused review of your company, market, financials, and existing materials to understand where you are in the capital raising journey and what is needed next.

  • Step 2

    Structure & Strategy

    Together we design the raise structure, clarify capital needs and use of funds, and align the story with the expectations of institutional and strategic investors.

  • Step 3

    Materials & Data Room

    We refine or create core materials such as the investor deck, one page summary, financial overview, and data room structure so that your information is clear, consistent, and easy to evaluate.

  • Step 4

    Outreach & Ongoing Support

    We support targeted outreach, follow up, and investor discussions, helping you respond to questions, refine messaging, and keep the process moving toward a successful close.
